explains: n. 调制解调器（等于 modulator-demodulator）
wordGroup: adsl modem 宽带调制解调器

sentences.en: He sent his work to his publishers by modem.
sentences.cn: 他通过调制解调器把作品发给他的出版商。

sentences.en: What's it called again? Yeah, that's right. A modem.
sentences.cn: 再说一遍它叫什么？好的，对，调制解调器。

sentences.en: A minimum 28,800 bps modem is probably the slowest you'll want to put up with.
sentences.cn: 一个最低28800比特/秒的调制解调器可能是你能愿意忍受的最慢的了。
